warnings.name: unused_local_variable
warnings.format: the variable '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_local_constant
warnings.format: the constant '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_global_variable
warnings.format: the global variable '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_global_constant
warnings.format: the global constant '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_class
warnings.format: the class '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_struct
warnings.format: the struct '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_concept
warnings.format: the concept '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_interface
warnings.format: the interface '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_function
warnings.format: the function '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_private_field
warnings.format: the field '{}' in '{}' '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_private_method
warnings.format: the method '{}' in '{}' '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_private_property
warnings.format: the property '{}' in '{}' '{}' is declared but never used.

errors.name: multiple_member_definitions
errors.format: the type '{}' already contains a definition for '{}'

errors.name: undeclared_identifier
errors.format: the name '{}' does not exist in the current context.

errors.name: irreducible_type
errors.format: the types '{}' and '{}' do not share a common type.

errors.name: mismatched_type_assignment
errors.format: the type '{}' cannot be assigned to an instance of '{}'

errors.name: infinitely_recursive_return_type_deduction
errors.message: deducing return type is infinitely recursive.
